name: arp
description: 用于查看和修改主机的ARP缓存表，该表包含IP地址与MAC地址的映射关系。

name: bc
description: 任意精度的计算器语言，支持基本的算术运算和复杂的数学函数。

name: bzip2
description: 高效的文件压缩工具，使用Burrows-Wheeler块排序文本压缩算法和霍夫曼编码。
syntax: bzip2 [flags and input files in any order]

options.description: treat all following arguments as files

name: bzless
description: 用于查看bzip2压缩文件的过滤器，类似于less命令。

name: colrm
description: 用于从标准输入中删除指定的列，常用于文本处理。

name: column
description: 将输入文本格式化为多列输出，支持自动调整列宽和对齐。

options.name: -E, --table-noextreme
options.description: do not print header and footer

name: diff
description: 用于比较两个或多个文件的差异，输出文件内容的不同之处。

options.name: -u, -U, --unified <n>
options.description: show n lines of unified context

options.name: -p, --show-c-function
options.description: show which C function each change is in

options.name: -X, --exclude-from <file>
options.description: exclude files that match any pattern in file

options.name: -S, --starting-file <file>
options.description: start with file when comparing directories

options.name: -H, --speed-large-files
options.description: assume large files and many scattered small changes

options.name: -l, --paginate
options.description: pass output through pr to paginate it

options.name: -t, --expand-tabs
options.description: expand tabs to spaces in output

options.name: -T, --initial-tab
options.description: make tabs line up by prepending a tab

options.name: --tabsize <n>
options.description: set tab size to n spaces

name: diff3
description: 用于比较三个文件的差异，常用于合并不同版本的文件。

options.name: -X
options.description: output an extended context ed script

options.name: -T, --initial-tab
options.description: make tabs line up by prepending a tab

name: dig
description: 域名系统(DNS)查询工具，用于查询DNS服务器获取域名解析信息。

options.name: -i
options.description: use IP6.INT for IPv6 reverse lookups

options.name: -i
options.description: use IP6.INT for IPv6 reverse lookups

options.name: -L
options.description: print response in zone file format

options.name: -i
options.description: use IP6.INT for IPv6 reverse lookups

options.name: -L
options.description: print response in zone file format

name: flex
description: 词法分析器生成器，用于生成处理文本的程序，常与bison配合使用。

name: fold
description: 用于将长行文本折叠为指定宽度的短行，便于终端显示。

name: getopt
description: 用于解析命令行选项的工具，支持短选项和长选项。

options.name: -n, --name <progname>
options.description: set program name for error messages

name: gperf
description: 生成完美哈希函数的工具，用于快速查找关键字。

name: gprof
description: 程序性能分析工具，用于分析程序的执行时间，找出性能瓶颈。

name: groff
description: 文档格式化系统，用于将格式化的文本转换为各种输出格式。

name: hexdump
description: 以十六进制和ASCII格式显示文件内容，用于查看二进制文件。

name: host
description: 简单的DNS查询工具，用于查询域名的IP地址或反向查询。

name: iostat
description: 系统I/O统计工具，用于监控系统的磁盘I/O和CPU使用情况。

name: locate
description: 快速查找文件的工具，基于预构建的文件数据库进行搜索。

options.name: -A, --all
options.description: only print entries that match all patterns

name: m4
description: 通用宏处理器，用于文本替换和宏扩展，常被其他工具使用。

name: make
description: 自动化构建工具，用于根据Makefile中的规则编译和链接程序。

options.name: -k, --keep-going
options.description: keep going when some targets can't be made

options.name: -l, --load-average <n>
options.description: don't start new jobs if load average is at least n

options.name: -L, --check-symlink-times
options.description: use symlink times for target files

options.name: -n, --just-print
options.description: print commands but don't execute them

options.name: -q, --question
options.description: don't run any commands; exit status says if up to date

options.name: -t, --touch
options.description: touch targets instead of remaking them

options.name: -w, --print-directory
options.description: print directory names as make enters and leaves them

name: mpstat
description: 多处理器统计工具，用于监控每个CPU核心的使用情况。

name: nslookup
description: DNS查询工具，用于查询域名解析信息，支持交互式操作。

name: script
description: 用于记录终端会话的工具，将所有输入和输出保存到指定文件。

options.name: -c, --command <command>
options.description: run command rather than interactive shell

name: unexpand
description: 将文件中的空格转换为制表符，可指定转换规则

name: updatedb
description: 更新系统文件位置数据库（供locate命令快速查询文件）

options.name: --prunepaths='dir1 dir2...'
options.description: Specify directories to exclude from search

options.name: --netuser=user
options.description: Specify user for network directory search

options.name: --localuser=user
options.description: Specify user for local directory search

name: whereis
description: 查找指定命令的二进制文件、源代码文件及对应手册页位置

name: xmllint
description: 对 XML 文件进行解析、验证、格式化及语法检查的工具

options.name: --version
options.description: Display the version of the XML library used

options.name: --debug
options.description: Dump a debug tree of the in-memory document

options.name: --debugent
options.description: Debug the entities defined in the document

options.name: --recover
options.description: Output what was parsable on broken XML documents

options.name: --huge
options.description: Remove any internal arbitrary parser limits

options.name: --noent
options.description: Substitute entity references by their value

options.name: --noenc
options.description: Ignore any encoding specified inside the document

options.name: --path 'paths'
options.description: Provide a set of paths for resources

options.name: --load-trace
options.description: Print trace of all external entities loaded

options.name: --nonet
options.description: Refuse to fetch DTDs or entities over network

options.name: --nocompact
options.description: Do not generate compact text nodes

options.name: --nowrap
options.description: Do not put HTML doc wrapper

options.name: --valid
options.description: Validate the document in addition to standard well-formed check

options.name: --postvalid
options.description: Do a posteriori validation, i.e after parsing

options.name: --dtdvalid URL
options.description: Do a posteriori validation against a given DTD

options.name: --dtdvalidfpi FPI
options.description: Same as --dtdvalid but name the DTD with a Public Identifier

name: xsltproc
description: 使用 XSLT 样式表将 XML 文件转换为其他格式（如 HTML、TXT）

options.name: --novalid
options.description: Skip DTD validation of input documents

options.name: --xmlout
options.description: Force XML output even if HTML is detected

options.name: --param name expression
options.description: Pass a parameter to the stylesheet (string values must be quoted)

options.name: --stringparam name value
options.description: Pass a (parameter, UTF8 string value) pair

options.name: --path 'paths'
options.description: Provide a set of paths for resources

options.name: --nonet
options.description: Refuse to fetch DTDs or entities over network

options.name: --nowrite
options.description: Refuse to write to any file or resource

options.name: --writesubtree path
options.description: Allow file write only within the specified path subtree

options.name: --catalogs
options.description: Use SGML catalogs from $SGML_CATALOG_FILES (default: XML Catalogs from file:///etc/xml/catalog)

options.name: --xinclude
options.description: Do XInclude processing on document input

options.name: --load-trace
options.description: Print trace of all external entities loaded

name: zcmp
description: 直接对比两个压缩文件的字节内容，无需手动解压

options.name: -i, --ignore-initial=N1:N2
options.description: Ignore first N1 bytes of FILE1 and N2 bytes of FILE2

examples: zcmp --silent report1.gz report2.gz && echo 'Files are identical'

name: zdiff
description: 对比两个压缩文件的文本内容差异，输出逐行对比结果

options.name: -u, -U NUM, --unified[=NUM]
options.description: Output NUM (default 3) lines of unified context

options.name: -i, --ignore-case
options.description: Ignore case differences in file contents

options.name: -b, --ignore-space-change
options.description: Ignore changes in the amount of whitespace

name: stty
description: 配置和查看终端设备的设置

options.name: -a
options.description: Print all current settings in human-readable form

options.name: csN
options.description: Set character size to N bits (5, 6, 7, 8)
